duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble and install rigging gear for lifting, lowering, and moving heavy objects.
Work with weight handling equipment such as fork trucks, cranes, wire ropes, and slings.
Inspect, maintain, and repair equipment of trade.
Coordinate and arrange the work of several trades in connection with performing work from technical work documents, blueprints, specifications, written and/or oral instructions.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years experience in rigging in shipyards
Maritime OSHA 10 Certification and VRSA Certified
